sentences.en: Taking a ride on the hormonal roller-coaster means lots of changes—and a lot of common worries—for both guys and girls.
sentences.cn: 坐荷尔蒙过山车意味着许多变化——我们都有共同的担忧——无论是对于男孩还是女孩。

sentences.en: I've been on an emotional roller coaster since I've been here.
sentences.cn: 自从我到这里以来，情绪像坐上了过山车。
